author: CBC News
title: Edmonton man keeps 'even keel' during Beijing quarantine, 54 days in isolation
description: Throughout his career, playing minor hockey in 13 countries, Rory Rawlyk has come to expect brushes with disaster.
content:
Throughout his career playing minor hockey in 13 countries, Rory Rawlyk has come to expect brushes with disaster. 
Rawlyk arrived at a New York Rangers training camp on Sept. 11, 2001, hours before the World Trade Center towers collapsed.
In March 2010, he … [+3492 chars]
